title: The Wrong Games, Holiday Break Up Advice, Good Male Gifts, XMAS Voicemails and more.
itunes:title: The Wrong Games, Holiday Break Up Advice, Good Male Gifts, XMAS Voicemails and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The Chief Love Officer must explain what cheating really is and also what realities are attached to blended families. Fool #2 gives you the games that you can't play during the holiday's. The crew share strategies to minimize the burn of breaking up. Are there therapists out there that help sidepieces cope with being #2? Who here is a fan of man? Have you ever displayed certain signs that show you are smoking something? There is nothing but cellular cheer inside Steve's VM. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us that success ain't how far you got, it's the distance you travel from where you started.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
